Reviews.Title: so dissapointed
Reviews.Author: skifreak
Reviews.Content: worst phone ever. i ordered this and it was very bad. when i got it, the phone would not turn on. so, i went home and charged it for over a day, and it still would not turn on. i finally gave up and returned it, but after all the hassle i had been through, with shipping costs, it ended up costing me more than the phone was worth. dont waste your money on this piece of junk!

Reviews.Title: good ole faithful
Reviews.Author: Sheldon Noray
Reviews.Content: I had the 600, 650 and the TX so you could say I am a fan of Treo. The centro is a great phone with the right software. Palm OS was ahead of its time and the only Mobile software that came close to a desktop version. Palm only draw back is they never package their phone with a 5" or over screen. These are the some of the software that make this phone great; Agendus, TakePhone, Splash wallet, OfficeSuite, yourCall etc. The best in my view is award winning Agendus which puts your contacts, To Do, Calender, Stocks, Weather, notes and all messages under one roof. This is go to phone to check my busy schedule. I am going to get another so when this one is finish I have back up. GET ONE BEFORE THEY ARE ALL GONE.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint
Black-and-silver Palm-powered smartphone with 320 x 320 color touchscreen,full QWERTY keyboard, and 1.3-megapixel camera
Quad-band connectivity for global roaming and EDGE data network compatibility for AT&T; Mobile Music streaming and downloads
Comprehensive organizer functions, including contacts, to-do lists, calendar; text, e-mail, and instant messaging; Web browser; Bluetooth for wireless headsets; MicroSD memory expansion
Up to 3 hours of talk time, up to 300 hours (12.5 days) of standby time; measures 4.2 x 2.1 x 0.7 inches (HxWxD)
ProductInfo.Name: Palm Centro Unlocked Phone with QWERTY Keyboard, Touch Screen and 1.3 MP Camera--U.S. Version (Electric Blue)
